definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: At the end of the story, Seigo and Asako were attending the funeral of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 故事的结尾是省吾和志麻子一起去参加一个朋友葬礼。

sentences.english: But equally, Asako had been also traumatized.
sentences.chinese: 但是，志麻子也深受创伤。

sentences.english: She has a poor complexion and pock marks on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她满面菜色，额头上有些麻子。

sentences.english: To be safe, I prescribed an equal dose of castor oil for him.
sentences.chinese: 为了安全起见，我也给他吃了同样多的蓖麻子油。

sentences.english: The deadliest plant in the world is the castor bean plant.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最致命的植物是蓖麻子豆。

sentences.english: Is that your face? Long with the sesame cake, pockmarked.
sentences.chinese: 那是你的脸？长的跟芝麻饼似的，满脸麻子。

sentences.english: A swarthy pock-marked man jumped out from behind the policemen and howled for them to attack.
sentences.chinese: 从员警背后突然跳出一个黑麻子来，怒声喝打。

sentences.english: The flaxseed study was aimed at fighting prostate cancer, not treating a side effect.
sentences.chinese: 亚麻子研究的目的抗前列腺癌，并非治疗其副作用。

sentences.english: They took oil from castor oil plants2 and burned it in lamps.
sentences.chinese: 他们自蓖麻中提炼蓖麻子油，并放在油灯里烧。

sentences.english: In the eyes of a lover pockmarks are dimples.
sentences.chinese: 在的眼里，麻子也了喜欢的酒窝。

sentences.english: Permana is working to create a more environmentally-friendly plastic from the castor oil bean.
sentences.chinese: 博马纳正在研究如何利用蓖麻子产生更环保的塑料。

sentences.english: You'll also find these benefits in flaxseed oil and walnuts.
sentences.chinese: 亚麻子油和核桃也有这些功效。

sentences.english: In fact, at the very beginning, Asako also thought so.
sentences.chinese: 其实一开始，志麻子也是这么想的。

sentences.english: Other cholesterol-lowering options include flaxseed and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 其他如亚麻子和大蒜也可降低胆固醇。

sentences.english: A tour guide kept saying the same road like Asako.
sentences.chinese: 一位导游连声说路面简直像麻子一样。

sentences.english: Asako looked around the lonely house and a deep sense of despair overwhelmed her.
sentences.chinese: 看着凄冷的房间，志麻子感到了空前的绝望。

definition: head of a bao 保[bao3] in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system
